headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EINBENDER, ALVIN H.

snippet: EINBENDER--Alvin H.,passed away peacefully on June 22, 2016. He was surrounded by his loving family: his wife, Joan R. Einbender, their four children, Alison, Jay, Gail and Karen; his son-in-laws Paul Jacobson and Rink Smith; and his ten grandchildren, Erin, Bennett, Kirsten, Kim, Dana, Eli, Jake, Graham, Brooke and Halie. A service in celebration of Alvin's life will be held on Sunday, June 26, 2016 at 2pm at Frank E. Campbell Funeral Home, 1076 Madison Avenue, New York, NY. Contributions may be made in his honor to the UJA Federation of New York. 1/3
